actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that any State or local taxes imposed and collected on benefits paid thereunder must be returned to the appropriate social security trust fund.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to require that State and local taxes imposed on OASDI benefits be deposited in the appropriate OASDI trust fund.

titles.title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that any State or local taxes imposed and collected on benefits paid thereunder must be returned to the appropriate social security trust fund.
